description: This CSS file defines style rules and variables for a theme management system, specifying colors and styles for light and dark themes, as well as responsive design elements for various components in a React application.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Root container for the application, centralizes content with specific background and text colors based on the defined theme.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Style for the application logo with designated height and animation effects.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application providing layout and styles for display, including color transitions.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Style for links within the application with color transitions based on the theme.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between different themes, styled with position, color, padding, and shadow effects.
